item.title: Creating an Icon for my blog
item.author: arun@arunmozhi.in (Arunmozhi)
item.description: When I moved the site from Jekyll to Wordpress, I was asked to create a site icon by Wordpress. I was trying to play around with the letter from “t” from my screen name “tecoholic” in a couple of Vector editors using different fonts, handrawn symbols …etc., and finally landed on what I know best. Write a Python script for it. So here it is, my blog icon and the generator. It is just a stacking of “T"s but somehoe looks like the corner of ancient Chinese houses.
